attributes.additional_details:
This petition, run by 16 year old living in the area of Brent in London, aims to receive 2,000 signatures, triggering a clause that forces Brent council into discussing our campaign in a council meeting.

With this campaign, we aim for Brent council to reduce prices and make free trial classes available in council-run youth clubs, in activities ranging from creative subjects such as art to different kind of sports, giving children in the local community a chance to 'Get Out' and explore the wonders of childhood.
